project.title: Nodge - Visual Workflow Automation Platform
project.description: A sophisticated visual workflow automation platform that enables users to create custom workflows through node-based programming with secure credential management.
project.detailedDescription: Developed a comprehensive full-stack workflow automation solution using Next.js with advanced visual programming capabilities. Implemented a node-based interface using React Flow, allowing users to drag-and-drop nodes and create complex workflows through visual connections. Built secure credential management system with Prisma ORM for database operations, enabling users to store and reuse sensitive data across workflows. Created authentication system with user registration/login and personalized workflow dashboards.

project.title: Mock AI Interview Platform - Full Stack
project.description: An AI-powered text-based interview simulation platform that generates adaptive questions and provides intelligent evaluations using advanced language models.
project.detailedDescription: Engineered a comprehensive AI interview platform using Next.js, LangChain, and Gemini AI to revolutionize interview preparation. The system reduces interview preparation time by 75% and enables recruiters to evaluate twice as many candidates weekly. Implemented machine learning integration for adaptive question difficulty scaling and personalized candidate evaluation based on domain expertise. Supports multiple question types including technical, behavioral, and scenario-based assessments with real-time AI-powered feedback and scoring mechanisms.
project.role: Full Stack Developer & AI Integration Specialist

project.title: My NPM Packages Showcase - Next.js
project.description: A demonstration platform showcasing my published NPM packages with live examples, usage documentation, and interactive implementation previews.
project.detailedDescription: Developed a clean, professional showcase platform using Next.js to demonstrate the functionality and real-world applications of my published NPM packages. The platform features live implementation examples, comprehensive usage documentation, and interactive component previews. Implemented performance optimization techniques including lazy loading and efficient bundle management, resulting in a 35% reduction in page load times and 20% improvement in user engagement. Each package includes installation guides, API documentation, and practical use cases to help developers understand and implement the solutions effectively.

project.title: Cloudify Storage Provider - Next.js Platform
project.description: A modern cloud storage solution built with Next.js, offering seamless file management, sharing capabilities, and real-time collaboration features.
project.detailedDescription: Developed a comprehensive cloud storage platform frontend using Next.js with advanced file management capabilities. Implemented a responsive and intuitive user interface with Tailwind CSS and NextUI components. Utilized Redux for efficient global state management across complex file operations and user interactions. Deployed on Vercel for optimal performance and scalability, featuring drag-and-drop functionality, file previews, and secure sharing mechanisms.

project.title: Gamies Gaming World - Next.js Frontend
project.description: A modern gaming platform frontend built with Next.js, featuring game discovery, user profiles, and interactive UI components with seamless state management.
project.detailedDescription: Developed a comprehensive gaming frontend application deployed on Vercel using Next.js. Implemented responsive design with TailwindCSS and dynamic component library with NextUI. Managed complex application state using Redux and integrated with RAWG.io API for real-time game data fetching and filtering.
features: Responsive game catalog with search and filters
Game details with ratings and reviews
Optimized performance with SSR and ISR

project.title: MovieHUB Entertainment Platform - Full Stack
project.description: A comprehensive entertainment discovery platform featuring movies, TV shows, and celebrity information with personalized user experience and advanced customization options.
project.detailedDescription: Developed a full-stack entertainment application using modern web technologies with seamless integration of TMDB API. Built a responsive and immersive user interface with extensive customization capabilities including theme switching, font family selection, and personalized content preferences. Implemented advanced search functionality, detailed media information pages, and user watchlist features with persistent data storage.
features: Comprehensive movie and TV show database
Advanced search with filters and categories
Real-time data fetching from TMDB API

project.title: Job Desktop Dashboard - React Interface
project.description: A modern desktop dashboard interface for job management with custom-built carousel components and intuitive user experience design.
project.detailedDescription: Designed and developed a sophisticated desktop dashboard interface using ReactJS with a focus on performance and custom component implementation. Created a custom carousel system from scratch without relying on external libraries like Swiper.JS, demonstrating deep understanding of React hooks and DOM manipulation. Built a comprehensive job management dashboard with statistics visualization, task tracking, and user-friendly navigation system.
features: Custom-built carousel component without external libraries

about.title: Transforming ideas into scalable digital solutions
descriptions: I am a passionate full-stack developer specializing in modern web technologies. With expertise in both frontend and backend development, I create seamless, scalable applications that deliver exceptional user experiences while maintaining robust server-side architecture.

My approach combines clean, maintainable code with cutting-edge technologies like Next.js, NestJS, and TypeScript. I believe in building solutions that not only meet current requirements but are also future-ready and easily scalable.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: Building responsive, interactive web applications using Next.js with TypeScript, styled with TailwindCSS and enhanced with ShadCN UI components. Expert in state management with Redux Toolkit and Context API, plus specialized libraries like ReactFlow for complex visualizations.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Developing robust APIs and server-side applications using NestJS with TypeScript. Experienced in database design, authentication systems, microservices architecture, and implementing scalable backend solutions with proper error handling and security measures.

services.title: Full Stack Solutions
services.description: End-to-end application development combining modern frontend frameworks with powerful backend systems. Specializing in creating seamless integrations, optimized performance, and maintainable codebases with proper testing and deployment strategies.
